item.title: Boat Builders Incredible 20ft Shipping Container Home
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sPgjndFqqwY Living Big In A Tiny House Published on Aug 10, 2016 SUBSCRIBED 451K SUBSCRIBE SUBSCRIBED UNSUBSCRIBE A 20ft Shipping Container can be a challenging space to work with when constructing a home. Thankfully, with years of experience building super-yachts and racing boats, shipwright Evans is no stranger to working in small spaces and when it came to building his own home he has done a truly spectacular job of, quite literally, thinking inside the box.
